final_after: ^" I don't mind you being cocky right now."
^" So now? We just go our separate ways or?"
^" No, this is only the beginning."
^" Surely you didn't think there was only 3 apparations?"
^" I did tell you that you released EVERY evil in existence."
^"Well there goes my plans for the next eternity."
conclusion: ^The worst apparations bound to return to their prisons.
^The world is still full of evils that have escaped.
^The box can hold them again once more.
^But only if our hero's can find them first.
^Pandora sets out to clean up her mistakes.
